description: GTPC Peer UP Notification. This trap is sent when a new peer is added
or an existing peer goes down and comes back up.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpPeerGwUpNotif JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpGwIndex u 9999 JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpGwName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpInterfaceType s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpPeerName s EXAMPLE

description: Current Gateway ID value
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpGwIndex

description: A string that indicates the gateway name
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpGwName

description: GTP Interface Type which can be one of S5/S8/S11/S1U/S12/S4
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpInterfaceType

description: GTP Peer Name/IP
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpPeerName

description: GTPC Peer Down Notification. This trap is sent when a peer connection
goes down.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpPeerGwDnNotif JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpGwIndex u 9999 JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpGwName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpInterfaceType s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpPeerName s EXAMPLE

description: Current Gateway ID value
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpGwIndex

description: A string that indicates the gateway name
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpGwName

description: GTP Interface Type which can be one of S5/S8/S11/S1U/S12/S4
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpInterfaceType

description: GTP Peer Name/IP
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpPeerName

description: Peer down Threshold trap Active. This is sent when a peer connection
flaps for more than a higher threshold number of times with in a
monitor interval.

event.Summary: Flap count ($v5) of peer $v4 exceeded high threshold

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpPrDnTPerPrAlrmActv JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpGwIndex u 9999 JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpGwName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpInterfaceType s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpPeerName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpAlarmStatCounter u 9999

description: Current Gateway ID value
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpGwIndex

description: A string that indicates the gateway name
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpGwName

description: GTP Interface Type which can be one of S5/S8/S11/S1U/S12/S4
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpInterfaceType

description: GTP Peer Name/IP
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpPeerName

description: Current Value of (Alarm) Statistics Counter
eg: in jnxMbgSgwGtpPrDNTPerPrAlrmActv it spefies the number
of times peer is down with in the monitoring interval
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpAlarmStatCounter

description: Peer down Threshold trap Cleared. This is sent when the number of
times a peer connection flaps in a monitor interval come down below
the lower threshold.

event.Summary: Flap count ($v5) of peer $v4 is below the maximum limit

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpPrDnTPerPrAlrmClr JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpGwIndex u 9999 JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpGwName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpInterfaceType s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpPeerName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SGW-GTP-MIB::jnxMbgSgwGtpAlarmStatCounter u 9999
